data.text: Nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi zɔle é lɛ è ʋɔ bɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, wɛlɛ dàaʋɛ ma, è ɠaaɓa mà,
Mina ɓe bà, gè ʋa li ga faa ɲɔi ʋɔ pelei,
Nà va bu telebo nui dòɠa, toɠa ná-nɛɛbɛi lɛɛzu ga ze,
Ta-ɠundiɠiiti ti ʋili ya fasaiti ma,
Eɠɛ nu a ɠɛ wozawolizu, é ɗa zooi laaʋali,
Makɛ mà, è kìzo telebotala nuiti ta-ʋaliiti ma
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ti loo ti ɓɔɠɔ ʋaliiti ga,
